description:
Manages a policy set definition.

-> **NOTE:**  Policy set definitions (also known as policy initiatives) do not take effect until they are assigned to a scope using a Policy Set Assignment.

AdditionalMetadataResourceId.description: The ID of a resource that contains additional metadata about this policy definition group.

Category.description: The category of this policy definition group.

Description.description: The description of this policy definition group.

DisplayName.description: The display name of this policy definition group.

Name.description: The name of this policy definition group.

ParameterValues.description: Parameter values for the referenced policy rule. This field is a JSON string that allows you to assign parameters to this policy rule.

PolicyDefinitionId.description: The ID of the policy definition or policy set definition that will be included in this policy set definition.

PolicyGroupNames.description: A list of names of the policy definition groups that this policy definition reference belongs to.

ReferenceId.description: A unique ID within this policy set definition for this policy definition reference.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Description.description: The description of the policy set definition.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the policy set definition.

ManagementGroupId.description: The name of the Management Group where this policy set definition should be defined. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ManagementGroupName.description: The name of the Management Group where this policy set definition should be defined. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Metadata.description: The metadata for the policy set definition. This is a json object representing additional metadata that should be stored with the policy definition.

Name.description: The name of the policy set definition. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Parameters.description: Parameters for the policy set definition. This field is a json object that allows you to parameterize your policy definition.

PolicyDefinitions.description: The policy definitions for the policy set definition. This is a json object representing the bundled policy definitions.

PolicyType.description: The policy set type. Possible values are `BuiltIn` or `Custom`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
